TopicTitle: TAC Life Support not producing Carbon Dioxide

Articles.Content:
Simple issue - TAC isn't producing Carbon Dioxide. This leads to issues as I need it for MKS to convert things...

 

...any ideas? Thanks!
Do you have kerbals on board and letting time pass?
Yep. I can have just a single pod on the runway and fast forward. Food resources drain, and wastes increase - but CarbonDioxide always remains empty.
This is by design. Kerbals don't use oxygen or produce CO2 while on kerbin.

Oh my goodness...... THANKS! 

 

Really difficult to build a test colony for MKS on Kerbin then...

1 minute ago, stibbles1000 said:

Oh my goodness...... THANKS! 

 

Really difficult to build a test colony for MKS on Kerbin then...

Ask over in the MKS thread for more advice. On overcoming this. IIRC, there was a module that produced carbon dioxide.
